name: Stolen Kingdom
description:
Pigs has stolen your kingdom! Its time you claim it back!

ART made by Pixel Frog -

https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/kings-and-pigs

Music made by Mike Berns Music -

  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/soundtrack-free-105631

SFX made by Little Robot Sound Factory -

  https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/8-bit-sfx-32831#description

Game made for My First Game Jam 2023 (MFGJ)
